snippet.title: Gemini 3 + NotebookLM creates stunning VISUALS & CHARTS in minutes!
snippet.description:
In this video, you’ll see how Gemini 3 and NotebookLM can turn your research and data into polished visuals in minutes.
I'll walk you through four practical workflows that show exactly how to create animated charts, structured infographics, interactive dashboards, and more… 

Each workflow starts in NotebookLM to gather and structure the information, then moves into Gemini 3 where the visual is generated instantly and ready for presentations or analysis.

Prompts used in the video:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SPi6-U2DO92KsxRMj-sdl3i1a8mDm8O8RJUIoAUr8UU/edit?usp=sharing 

Subscribe to the channel:
www.youtube.com/@AIandTechforEducation?sub_confirmation=1 

If you want faster research, clearer explanations, and visuals that stand out, this walkthrough will give you everything you need.

Subscribe for more step by step AI workflows and practical demos you can use right away.

#AITools #Gemini3 #NotebookLM #AIWorkflows #DataVisualisation #GoogleAI #AnimatedCharts #Infographics #AIStrategy #DeepResearch #ProductivityTools #EdTech #AISkills #AITrends #AIResearch #VisualReports #AIInsights #TechTrends #FutureOfWork #AgenticAI
